sentences.en: " I am a stranger , and have been a wanderer, sorely against my will.
sentences.cn: “ 我是个外地人, 一直迫不得已地到处流浪.

sentences.en: As everyone laughed, Wanderer could not say anything.
sentences.cn: 看看大家笑的开心, 咱也不能皱眉呀.

sentences.en: But the wanderer has chosen the wrong direction.
sentences.cn: 然而这个流浪者却选择了错误的方向.

sentences.en: I am a stranger , and have been a wanderer against my will.
sentences.cn: 我是个外地人, 一直迫不得已地到处流浪.

sentences.en: I am listless, I am a wanderer in my heart.
sentences.cn: 我心绪不宁, 我是自己心中的流浪者.

sentences.en: I feel I have come to know this hero, this wanderer.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我有必要认识下这个英雄, 这个流浪者.

sentences.en: I've heard her called a quitter for leaving and aimless wanderer.
sentences.cn: 在那儿,她又能推倒陈腐的围墙,树起全新的理念.

sentences.en: Lanlansansan life, the distant wanderer urgent Huang Huang Wen Ai's way chill.
sentences.cn: 懒懒散散的生活, 温暖了远方游子急慌慌的一路风寒.

sentences.en: Odysseus is the archetype of the wanderer.
sentences.cn: 奥地修斯是长途漫游者的原型.

sentences.en: The heroes defeat the demoness Andariel and journey east, following the Wanderer.
sentences.cn: 他们先是女魔头Andariel然后追踪黑暗徘徊者向东行进.

sentences.en: The wanderer has to sleep rough.
Vast is the power of cities to reclaim the wanderer.
sentences.cn: 城市对迷途人感召力量是巨大的.

sentences.en: Way - worn wanderer bore to his own native shore.
sentences.cn: 载着漂泊疲倦的船员,驶向他故乡的海岸.

sentences.en: You shall be a vagrant and a wanderer on earth.
sentences.cn: 你会成为流浪汉,到处漂泊.

words.tran_cn: 流浪的；漫游的，徘徊的；蜿蜒的
流浪者；漫游者；迷路的动物

trans.tran_cn: 流浪汉，闲逛者，游走动物
trans.tran_en: a person who moves from place to place and has no permanent home
